dataset_description.Name: MIND DATA
dataset_description.HowToAcknowledge:
Please cite: 

M.P. Weisend, F.M. Hanlon, R. Montaño, S.P. Ahlfors, A.C. Leuthold, D. Pantazis, J.C. Mosher, A.P. Georgopoulos, M.S. Hämäläinen, C.J. Aine,, V. (2007). Paving the way for cross-site pooling of magnetoencephalography (MEG) data. International Congress Series, Volume 1300, Pages 615-618,.
Funding: This work was supported by U.S. DOE Award Number DE-FG02-99ER62764 to The MIND Institute
by The Center for Functional Neuromaging Technologies (NIH grant P41-RR14075)
and by Los Alamos National Security
for the NNSA of the U.S. DOE under contract DE-AC52-06NA25396.

readme_content:
This data was part of the study of:

M.P. Weisend, F.M. Hanlon, R. Montaño, S.P. Ahlfors, A.C. Leuthold, D. Pantazis, J.C. Mosher, A.P. Georgopoulos, M.S. Hämäläinen, C.J. Aine,, V. (2007). Paving the way for cross-site pooling of magnetoencephalography (MEG) data. International Congress Series, Volume 1300, Pages 615-618,.

It was converted to BIDS with MNE-BIDS:

Appelhoff, S., Sanderson, M., Brooks, T., Vliet, M., Quentin, R., Holdgraf, C., Chaumon, M., Mikulan, E., Tavabi, K., Höchenberger, R., Welke, D., Brunner, C., Rockhill, A., Larson, E., Gramfort, A. and Jas, M. (2019). MNE-BIDS: Organizing electrophysiological data into the BIDS format and facilitating their analysis. Journal of Open Source Software 4: (1896). https://doi.org/10.21105/joss.01896

Following the MEG-BIDS format:

Niso, G., Gorgolewski, K. J., Bock, E., Brooks, T. L., Flandin, G., Gramfort, A., Henson, R. N., Jas, M., Litvak, V., Moreau, J., Oostenveld, R., Schoffelen, J., Tadel, F., Wexler, J., Baillet, S. (2018). MEG-BIDS, the brain imaging data structure extended to magnetoencephalography. Scientific Data, 5, 180110. https://doi.org/10.1038/sdata.2018.110
